name: Kandinsky - The Art Game
description:
Kandinsky is not just a puzzle game, is an expression of art, explore all the collections, each level is an abstract modern masterpiece made of points, lines and planes.
Put your headphones on and let yourself be carried away by classical music.

INDIVIDUALLY CRAFTED PORTRAITS
Enjoy more than 100 beautiful portraits, interact with them using strange and unexpected items.

ABSTRACT VISUALS
Artwork inspired to modern and abstract art, if you like modern art, you will find a lot of details from your favorite artists.

BEAUTIFUL AUDIO
Immerse yourself with classical music soundtrack.
